thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 07 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Amplify Energy Reports Quarterly Earnings Per Share $0.38

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Amplify Energy Reports Quarterly Earnings Per Share $0.38
text:
March 7 (Reuters) - Amplify Energy Corp:
* AMPLIFY ENERGY ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS, YEAR-END 2017 PROVED RESERVES AND 2018 GUIDANCE
* AMPLIFY ENERGY CORP SAYS CAPITAL SPENDING FOR FULL YEAR 2018 IS EXPECTED TO BE ABOUT $65 TO $80 MILLION
* AMPLIFY ENERGY CORP QUARTERLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.38 * AMPLIFY ENERGY CORP QUARTERLY TOTAL REVENUES $87.5 MILLION VERSUS $75.6 MILLION PRIOR QUARTER
* AMPLIFY ENERGY CORP SEES FY 2018 TOTAL NET AVERAGE DAILY PRODUCTION IN RANGE OF 169 - 187 MMCFE/D Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
